name: Eustache Tactical Psychology Simulator
description:
You're playing Eustache, a psychiatrist that has to help some rich kid Apollinaire to deal with his depression by shooting the right arguments at him with his trusty flying shotgun.

We chose to mix the narrative psychologic genre that has a lot of dialogues with consequences with the top down dynamic 2D Shooter (take Enter The Gungeon or Hotline Miami as examples).

We wanted to do a boss compilation, each boss being one of Eustache's patients, and we wanted to end the jam with one completed boss, telling ourselves that it was a reasonable goals ... Yeah, we kinda messed up :/

The boss had different phases, all the bullets shot at the boss were supposed to have a different effect and only appear when a certain item is triggered etc. Basically, the programming scope was to high for us (we're all in first year of Game Design or Animation studies).

The actual finished prototype is getting finished and debugged so the only thing we have is a bunch of screen shots a preAlpha build ... sort of. But at least, pretty much all of the graphic elements are finished end look pretty good ^^

Still, we had a blast making it and we hope you'll enjoy running around in the house ^^
